Stylish Portfolio

A stylish, one page, Bootstrap portfolio theme featuring off canvas navigation and smooth page scrolling.

  1. LayoutSchool
  2. Templates
  3. Stylish Portfolio

License & Author Details:

Theme Comments:

comments powered by Disqus

Need a Custom Build?

If you like this theme, but need something a bit more custom, you can hire the Start Bootstrap design team to create a custom version of this template! Email us at feedback@layoutschool.com for more information!

Theme Description:

Stylish Portfolio is a one page Bootstrap portfolio theme with off canvas navigation and smooth scrolling through content sections.

Theme Features:

  • New! Updated design featuring two custom button styles
  • Off canvas navigation with custom toggle button
  • 100% height header section with full page background image and vertically centered content
  • Smooth page scrolling using jQuery
  • Call to action sections
  • Services section with Font Awesome icons
  • Portfolio image grid
  • Google Maps integrated footer
  • Footer with social icons
